meanings.sent1: The profuse rainfall flooded the streets.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with profuse blooms in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The profuse display of fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: Her profuse generosity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The profuse waterfall cascaded down the rocks with power.

meanings.sent1: The profuse harvest ensured food for the entire village.
meanings.sent2: The forest was home to a profuse variety of wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The profuse amount of laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her profuse collection of books lined every shelf in the library.
meanings.sent5: The profuse stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.sent1: Her profuse spending habits left her in debt.
meanings.sent2: The profuse decorations at the party created a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The profuse use of glitter made the craft project sparkle.
meanings.sent4: His profuse apologies could not undo the damage.
meanings.sent5: The profuse layers of frosting made the cake a sugary delight.
